about_the_game:
Explore the world of Heméide and its puzzles, made up of shapes, numbers and mathematical symbols. Use your logic to unlock the obstacles that stand in the way of your quest to openmind the Synapsian people.

A UNIQUE AND FUN GAME CONCEPT:


  • Use your skills to create shapes, trigger levers, or take aim at vector targets to crack the mind-bending puzzles!
  • The game’s concepts and mechanics were tested and recommended by the Research Institute for Mathematics Education (IREM de Lyon).
  • The progressive difficulty curve and clues are tailored to onboard every gamer starting 13 years old.



Fight enemies cooperatively with Nero & Sci to boost your platforming skills. Yo can also connect a second controller to solve puzzles with a 2 players local co-op mode. Collect orbs, and explore the mysterious world of logic based puzzles:

  • 4 worlds to discover in a colorful art direction of shapes, numbers and mathematical symbols.
  • 36 levels in the campaign mode and hidden levels to unlock.
  • More than 20 hours of gameplay and strong replayability.

SYNOPSIS


Néro is a young Synapsian who lives on the streets of Curiosita, the capital of the world of Heméide, home to a people wallowing in their achievements.

Néro has taken refuge in the library of Psyga, whom he considers like his father.
While cleaning out the basement of the library, Nero drops a jar containing Sci and knocks over a book that unleashes the Chaos theories and plunges them into the caves of Heméide, from which they will have to escape!


Néro & Sci is a remastered and rebranded version of A Tale of Synapse: The Chaos Theories

What’s New With Néro & Sci?

  • New UI, accessibility improved.
  • Checkpoints at each puzzle vs each level.
  • A new mode to increase the difficulty of combat.
  • Revised puzzle mechanics and hints in collaboration with French Research Institute for Mathematics Education (IREM de Lyon).
  • New languages supported.
  • Steam deck compatibility.

Coming Soon
detailed_description:
Important Note

Your instinct and reflection will take precedence over your mathematical skills to get through each level!
You'll plunge into immersive, story-filled landscapes to discover the secrets hidden there, while sharpening your logic and observation skills.

" Mathematics is a gymnastics of the mind and a preparation for philosophy." Isocrates .
